title: Mike Cannon: Shot in the Gut
description: Comedian Mike Cannon is put to the test this week on Are You Garbage?! Mike and shares a WILD story about a shooting involving his family members. He also shares hilarious ones about his Irish Catholic family, his love for JNCO jeans, and being the token white dude during Junior College Basketball days.  You may know Mike from his appearances on MTV, Legion of Skanks podcast, and History Hyenas.  Have submissions for AYG? Email: AreYouGarbage@gmail.com Please SUBSCRIBE and leave a 5 STAR REVIEW!
